content.text:
# Forward Rebels

"Forward Rebels", also known as "Rebel March", is the fight song for the University of Mississippi. It is played by the Ole Miss "The Pride of the South" marching band at official university sporting events.
External links
*[http://band.olemiss.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/124/2014/03/01ForwardRebels_000.m4a Song recording]
*Lyrics source: "Forward Rebels." [https://web.archive.org/web/20100113145447/http://www.olemisssports.com/ViewArticle.dbml?DB_OEM_ID=2600&ATCLID=1088639 Forward Rebels lyrics at OleMissSports.com]. Retrieved on October 23, 2009.
